Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controllers.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HomeController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for the Home screen of the application.

This class handles the following in the Home Menu:

  • Initializing UI elements (high score, timer text, audio)
  • Binding button interactions for settings, play, timer adjustment, and exit

This controller is automatically instantiated by JavaFX when the homeLayout.fxml file is loaded.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the Home screen.

      This method will:

      • Ensures a save file exists using SaveData.createSaveFile()
      • Loads and displays the current high score
      • Plays the background music (BGM)
      • Loads sound effects when a button is pressed
      • Assigns mouse event handlers to the Settings, Play, Timer, and Exit buttons
      • Handles scene switching when the Play button is clicked
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - unused but required by Initializable
      resources - unused but required by Initializable

    • getCurrentTimer

      public void getCurrentTimer(boolean add)
      Allow users to choose the timer option

      This method updates:

      • The displayed timer chosen
      • Update the game timer duration using Timer
      • The displayed high score belonging to the selected timer

      Timer modes wrap around (1â€“5). Example: moving forward from option 5 returns to option 1.

      Parameters:
      add - true to increment the timer option, false to decrement
